list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Sniper rifle update.
Modified ammo stack sizes. Modified rifles' stats. Overhauled grenade model. Started working on sniper rifle model. Added WIP resources and updated test world.

task.summary: Default task

Made incendiary grenades set entities on fire for 10 seconds after an explosion. Cleaned up enchantment code. Added ADS speed tooltip. Fixed ADS recoil and ADS spread tooltips to not show on guns without aiming capabilities.
Fixed ticking entity issue. Tweaked fire grenade sounds. Changed rocket and pipe grenade sounds. Cleaned up some code.

Reduced sound distance values. Extended explosive projectile lives. Tweaked molotov model to be smaller. Tweaked third person shielding animations with pistols to correspond to first person. Fixed fire grenades radius tooltip. Renamed Deafen to Stun in configs. Added in-world light when shooting guns (code from Scorched Guns by ribs).
Added projectile flyby sound. Removed PausedGameEvent. Optimized rotating projectiles code. Partial refactoring of sounds.
Small tweak to gunfire light.
Fixed datapack validation errors. More code changes in preparation for wallbang changes. Projectiles now continue flying if they destroy a fragile block (WIP).
Fixed datapack validation errors. More code changes in preparation for wallbang changes. Projectiles now continue flying if they destroy a fragile block (WIP).

Datagen update and fixes, sounds clean up.
Removed chests, barrels and logs from fragile tag. Refactored ModSounds. Flyby sounds no longer play for rockets and pipe grenades. Optimized sounds.json. Preparing to overhaul sniper rifle. Updated and added datagen for: - Block tags - Entity tags - Guns (partially)

Player behavior update.
Moved ModTags to init. Added PlayerHandler and finished working on heavy item tag. Player no longer can sprint while crawling. Added spawnCasings property to guns (WIP).

Dynamic light update.
Rockets and fire grenades now produce light when flying/thrown. Guns now produce light when shot. Explosions now produce light.

Dynamic light and durability fixes.
Guns and attachments can't be enchanted now. Gunfire light visual effect is now tied to config value. Changed repair kit recipe and model. Fixed bug that allowed guns to shoot if their durability was negative.

Clean up.
Moved around files and folders. Cleaned up various files and classes.

Tactical belt (WIP)
Added files in preparation of tactical belt implementation. Added test world to project files.

Pouch item (WIP)
Minor fixes.
Reserve ammo fix for backpacks.
Small fixes.

Animation update.
Added draw animations. Aiming FOV tweaks. Small fixes.

Animation update.
Renamed some poses. One-handed pose now has smoother transitions for sprinting. Off-hand fix for pistol poses. More sprinting restrictions. Grenades are now thrown with half velocity if crouching.

Sound update.
Updated SFX for: - Tactical Pistol - Automatic Pistol - Assault Rifle Small pistol pose fix.

Attachment update.
Added muzzle break. Added compensator. Slightly refreshed barrel models. Reordered attachment modifiers.

Attachment update.
Added muzzle break. Added compensator. Slightly refreshed barrel models. Reordered attachment modifiers.

Attachment update.
Added muzzle break. Added compensator. Slightly refreshed barrel models.

MESSAGE.value: Small tweak to gunfire light.
Small tweak to gunfire light. Added some code relating to an upcoming wallbang feature.
Fixed datapack validation errors. More code changes in preparation for wallbang changes. Projectiles now continue flying if they destroy a fragile block.
Fixed datapack validation errors. More code changes in preparation for wallbang changes. Projectiles now continue flying if they destroy a fragile block (WIP).

Fixed datapack validation errors. More code changes in preparation for fragile breaking changes. Added tags that make entites immune (entities completely ignore projectiles) or resistant (entities take less damage from projectiles and disallow piercing). Fixed endermen showing hitmarkers and spilling blood when shot. Explosion code optimizations.

Datagen update and fixes, sounds clean up.
Removed chests, barrels and logs from fragile tag. Refactored ModSounds. Flyby sounds no longer play for rockets and pipe grenades. Optimized sounds.json. Preparing to overhaul sniper rifle. Updated and added datagen for: - Block tags - Entity tags - Guns (partially)

Spread and aiming update, smoke update, various fixes.
Explosions now destroy fragile blocks regardless of block griefing config and uses it's own config instead. Player speed is reduced while aiming. Spread is now influenced by different player actions: - If player is sprinting or in air, spread is no less than 50%. - If player is crouching or crawling, spread is no more than 75%

Player behavior update.
Moved ModTags to init. Added PlayerHandler and finished working on heavy item tag. Player no longer can sprint while crawling. Added spawnCasings property to guns (WIP).

Dynamic light update.
Rockets and fire grenades now produce light when flying/thrown. Guns now produce light when shot. Explosions now produce light.

Dynamic light and durability fixes.
Guns and attachments can't be enchanted now. Gunfire light visual effect is now tied to config value. Changed repair kit recipe and model. Fixed bug that allowed guns to shoot if their durability was negative.

Clean up.
Moved around files and folders. Cleaned up various files and classes.

Tactical belt (WIP)
Added files in preparation of tactical belt implementation. Added test world to project files.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main'
# Conflicts: # .idea/workspace.xml # src/main/java/com/mrcrayfish/guns/init/ModItems.java

Revert "Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main'"
This reverts commit c5a74a4994bf602d3b28216519115f4071a8531d, reversing changes made to b41d062892eb5879f6f4cb08e654b2e2bf2b9ddc.

Pouch item (WIP)
Minor fixes.
Reserve ammo fix for backpacks.
Small fixes.

Animation update.
Added draw animations. Aiming FOV tweaks. Small fixes.

Animation update.
Renamed some poses. One-handed pose now has smoother transitions for sprinting. Off-hand fix for pistol poses. More sprinting restrictions. Grenades are now thrown with half velocity if crouching.

Sound update.
Updated SFX for: - Tactical Pistol - Automatic Pistol - Assault Rifle Small pistol pose fix.
Reduced low durability sound volume.

Attachment update.
Added muzzle break. Added compensator. Slightly refreshed barrel models. Reordered attachment modifiers.

Attachment update.
Added muzzle break. Added compensator. Slightly refreshed barrel models.

Sniper rifle update.
Modified ammo stack sizes. Modified rifles' stats. Overhauled grenade model. Started working on sniper rifle model. Added WIP resources and updated test world.
